xml.name: Rename
xml.Text: You can rename anything by placing the caret on a symbol and using the Rename refactoring.
xml.Try: Navigate to MasterViewController.swift by pressing GotoFile
Let's start with something simple like renaming the objects field to array. Press RenameElement, enter a new name, and then press EditorEnter
Now, repeat the same actions and rename the DetailViewController type to something new.
Press FindUsages. As you can see, the rename works globally, even renaming occurrences in .xib and .storyboard files.
